title: fontlab opentype - programming alternates
content:
Hi,

I would like to have different versions for each letter, just like with the opentype font liza:

[http://www.underware.nl/site2/index.php?id1=liza&id2=test](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106225656/http:/www.underware.nl/site2/index.php?id1=liza&id2=test "http://www.underware.nl/site2/index.php?id1=liza&id2=test")

Only how can i code with opentype that it grabs another 'd' for example if it's the second d in a word or in the total text?
author: clankill3r

comments.content:
Tthe second letter in a word would be relatively straightforward:

` ignore sub @Letters @Letters d';
sub @Letters d' by d.alt; `

I'm not sure how one would handle the second case.
